content: soccer mitts by erica lueder materials yarn fingering weight approximately 218 yds sample mitts knit with knit picks felici in the eclipse colorway size/needles/gauge  women s small/med closer-fitting us 1 2 25mm - set of 2 circular needles or size needed to obtain gauge gauge 36 sts per 4 inches 10cm  women s med/large looser-fitting us 2 2 75mm set of 2 circular needles or size needed to obtain gauge gauge 32 sts per 4 inches 10cm note sample mitts were knit using a us 1 needle i have smaller hands and could finish a pair of mitts using almost all of 1 50gm ball of knit picks felici if you want to add any length to any part of the mitts and/or are using a larger needle you will need more yardage than stated above instructions cuff co 60 sts 30 sts per ndl and join for working in the round *k1 p1* x 20 rounds or until desired length is reached knit 20 rounds in st st copyright erica lueder & dreams in fiber 2018 for personal use only 1 mitt body continue knitting mitt body in st st while at same time increasing for the thumb gusset as per the thumb gusset chart place markers on either side of the thumb gusset during the first row of the gusset and slip them as you come to them on each subsequent row after completing row 26 of the thumb gusset chart thread waste yarn through each of the thumb sts the thumb gussets are placed on ndl 2 as follows for the left and right mitts respectively to ensure a comfortable fit thumb gusset right mitt ndl 1 k in st st ndl 2 k2 pm m1l k2 m1r pm knit to end 4 thumb gusset sts left mitt ndl 1 k in st st ndl 2 k to last 4 sts pm m1l k2 m1r pm k2 4 thumb gusset sts increase row are now knit as follows right/left mitt ndl 1 k in st st ndl 2 k to marker sm m1l k to marker m1r sm k to end **22 total thumb gusset sts** copyright erica lueder & dreams in fiber 2018 for personal use only 2 thumb gusset chart thumb gusset chart key next row removing thumb gusset sts from ndl 2 ndl 1 k in st st ndl 2 k to 1 st before marker in pattern kfbl remove marker place thumb gusset sts on spare piece of yarn if you haven t already and remove from ndl remove second marker next st kfbl k to end **there should be 60 sts total 30 sts per ndl at this point ** mitt top continue to knit in st st across both ndls until desired length is reached leaving approximately 0 75 inch for the ribbing sample mitts approximately 16 rounds *k1 p1* x 7 row bobble loosely in ribbing copyright erica lueder & dreams in fiber 2018 for personal use only
